GameObjects

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObjects.GameObjects
      • GameObjects.Bullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyBullets, PlayerBullets

    public class Bullet
extends GameObjects
    This class is used to control bullets in the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    FarisAlasmary
    See Also:
    EnemyBullets, PlayerBullets

        public Bullet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bulletImage)
        Constructs the bullet object. This is the most common in use
        Parameters:
        bulletImage - is the image of the bullet
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if there is no bulletImage

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bulletImage,
      Position targetPosition)
        Constructs the bullet object.
        Parameters:
        bulletImage - is the image of the bullet
        targetPosition - is the destination
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if there is no bulletImage OR targetPosition

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bulletImage,
      Position targetPosition,
      Player player)
        Constructs the bullet object.
        Parameters:
        bulletImage - is the image of the bullet
        targetPosition - is the destination
        player - to take the rotation angle from and other stuffs
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if there is no bulletImage OR targetPosition OR player
